title: how to get out of elo hell
body: hi guys i need help to escape elo hell. I was silver 3 in the preseason and i after promotionals i ended in bronze 2 with 8 wins. i was close to go bronze 1 but then things got downhill.... in most games i always have somebody that feeds or goes afk. no matter if i roam we end up losing most times. i dont rage except one game.  also i cant play with my friends because we dont meet a lot of times to go ranked.And now im bronze 4. no matter how friendly i am no matter what i do i just cant win. i wanted to go back to silver but thats just impossible {{item:3070}} give me some advice if possible please

replies.body:
This is the italian board dude, pls use italian or post on http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/
:)

My advices are:

- Don't play when you are tilted. After two loses, stop ranked for today. Play only when your mind is fresh.

- Every time you die ask yourself what was your mistake. Focus on not going out of position, this helped me climb  lot.

- Don't play in ranked champions that are just released (like Jhin, you know which game i'm talking about) and play only the campions you feel confident on. Just play your best.

Good luck! Remember that elo hell is only on your mind. :)
How to get out of Bronze? Just play, and do your best every game :)

Best advices for me the get out from bronze are:
1)Learn from your mistakes, focus on what you could have done better, and try to focus only on yourself, you prob won't meet again your teamates, so it's a waste of time try to "fix" them.
2)Try to understand the current meta, and which are the power picks at the moment : stronger is the champ in the meta, higher chance you have to win.
3)Train yourself in normal games, test the limit of the champion you like to main, learn all the possible matchups, when you can go aggro, when you have to play safe ecc...
4)If you are a Support or Adc main, I higly reccomand to duo with a person you are confident in, to fill the botlane's roles ^^
5)Keep in mind that you CANNOT WIN EVERY GAME, but still if you always play good, you will reach for sure a good winratio, remember as time goes on less is the "luck factor".
6)Don't blame your teammates, if they flame just mute them and focus on your game.
